name: Fallen Down (Feleidontknow)
description:
F̶̠͉̺͗̈̓͘a̴̛͓̋͗̽͘l̵̗̙̥͝ͅl̷̪͇̬̗͗͌ė̸̘̪̜͜n̴͍̹̿̅̓́̑̀͠ ̸͕̘͖̖̜̫̠͒̈́͝D̴͓̲͙͕̠͜͝ͅó̶̪̣̯͔͍̩͝w̴̨͈̘̠͍̌n̸͚̟͈̙̲̉̓̽̿̑̆͝ is a game about a h̴e̴r̷o̶ who need to save his world from the e̷v̵i̷l̸.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

[REAL DESCRIPITION] Fallen Down is a game with a mysterious error and your mission is find this error and delete then from the game!

[FEATURES]:

  • 30 Levels: 15 main levels and 15 bonus levels
  • A simple plot
  • A "Vhs" effect
  • English and Brazilian Portuguese versions
  • That's all

[CONTROLS]:

  • WASD for walk

[CREDITS]:

  • Made by Feletuby
  • Made with Godot Engine
  • Sprites made with Aseprite
  • Sounds made with JSFXR
